TopicTitle: Dev blogs - are you trolling us?

Articles.Content:
Okay okay you got us!

Post links to your dev blogs but nobody has permission to read them.....Nice one :-)

Currently, Curious Georges are unable to read the Developer blogs, when you have made 5 posts and are upgraded to Bottle Rocketeer, you will be able to read them.

This is a temporary thing, and the settings will be changed soon.

As this thread has served its purpose, I believe it can now be closed

Users with less than 5 posts and part of the Curious George group are currently unable to view the blogs. This is not intentional and is a configuration issue that will be corrected at some point today.

So relax and take a chill pill.

I'll see about promoting you to the Members group early so you can see them. If your birthdate is set correctly, I'll be able to.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Ah, thanks for pointing that out. I set the permissions so all members can now view blog posts.

Cheers

I'm relaxed.

Didn't you see my smiley face?

Mostly lurking, nice to know it was just a permissions issue.

Thanks for the prompt attention
